New Records: Nikola Jokic recorded his league-leading 15th triple-double of the season and the 145th of his career
Key Match Events: Nikola Jokic scored a triple-double with 35 points, 15 rebounds, and 12 assists
Russell Westbrook recorded a triple-double with 25 points, 11 rebounds, and 10 assists
The Nuggets led by six at halftime and built on that throughout the third quarter
The lead grew to 94-73 late in the third period
The Nuggets closed out the game with a 16-5 run to make it 117-100
Others: Denver Nuggets beat the Brooklyn Nets 124-105
